Society of Student Metallurgists(SSM) is the face that represents the face of the entire Department of Metallurgy and Materials Engineering at IIEST, Shibpur. It is the academic society of the Department of Metallurgy and Materials Engineering, IIEST Shibpur founded in the year 1939 to create an interface betweeen the students, faculties and alumni.

The society aims to bring about perfect harmony between technical and co-curricular skills development. It also provides students with a platform to explore and grow to their fullest potential.

 'If you want to be the best,learn from the best'. At SSM, we strive for excellence to acieve our dream of imparting knowledge in the young inquisitive minds of the future achievers of this generation.
